column4: Hey! A friend installed ubuntu on my laptop but I can't find Internet Explorer! Where can I download it?
ubuntu doesn't come with Internet Exploder. use Mozilla Firefox or Opera... or perhaps Google Chrome can be installed in linux as well, but not certain
ubuntu doesn't come with MS Internet Exploder. use Mozilla Firefox or Opera... or perhaps Google Chrome can be installed in linux as well, but not certain
your not going to get internet explorer installed into linux
